item.title: Laser background
item.dc:creator: @The_roy6 The roy6
item.description:
@The_roy6 wrote:

The mark used today is descended from a diagonal slash, or virgula suspensiva ( / ), used from the 13th to 17th centuries to represent a pause, notably by Aldus Manutius. In the 16th century, the virgule dropped to the bottom of the line and curved, turning into the shape used today

We all mistype don’t make it seem like it’s fine when you do.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2008, 08:26:53 PM[/size][hr]Yea fastbrawlz horrible moderator reported.

Read full topic

1. If you don't have anything nice to say, don't say anything at all.

item.title: Laser background
item.dc:creator: @The_roy6 The roy6
item.description:
@The_roy6 wrote:

[quote=“Cruzer, post:130, topic:189092”][quote author=The roy6 link=topic=251937.msg2117434#msg2117434 date=1205824234]
No and apes don’t talk. Anyways stop thinking big of your self maybe you will acctually make it somewhere in life.

Plus if i may add notice the commas(,) yes the commas in my sentences it’s called a pause.
[/quote]
There were not any commas in your posts… Thanks for realizing apes don’t talk.[/quote]
Yea okay thanks for posting like this word is full of smart asses
and there are commas also periods(.) shall i introduce thoughs?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2008, 08:16:34 PM[/size][hr][quote=“exps35, post:132, topic:189092”][quote author=The roy6 link=topic=251937.msg2117434#msg2117434 date=1205824234]
Plus if i may add notice the commas(,) yes the commas in my sentences it’s called a pause.
[/quote]

english 101.
Comma’s do not take the place of a pause.
that is what is known as a subordinate clause.

The roy6:

Plus if i may add notice the commas(,) yes the commas in my sentences it’s called a pause.

And your sentence had 0 commas. FAIL.[/quote]
Wow comma is a pause dude you sound retarded

en.wikipedia.org

Comma

؋ ​₳ ​ ฿ ​₿ ​ ₵ ​¢ ​₡ ​₢ ​ $ ​₫ ​₯ ​֏ ​ ₠ ​€ ​ ƒ ​₣ ​ ₲ ​ ₴ ​ ₭ ​ ₺ ​₾ ​ ₼ ​ℳ ​₥ ​ ₦ ​ ₧ ​₱ ​₰ ​£ ​ 元 圆 圓 ​﷼ ​៛ ​₽ ​₹ ₨ ​ ₪ ​ ৳ ​₸ ​₮ ​ ₩ ​ ¥ ​円 The comma ( , ) is a punctuation mark that appears in several variants in different languages. It has the same shape as an apostrophe ( ' ) or single closing quotation mark in many typefaces, but it differs from them in being placed on the baseline of the text. Some typefaces render it as a small line, slightly curved or straight but inclined from the ...


yea go learn something

and i hate the dumb phrase “fail” also it’s like you rpg people just come up with the stupidest things(.)Rpg talk(,)phrase “own”(,)and the stupid phrase “fail”(.)
